Name: Aquila Favonia
Title: Let the Wind Lead: Aquila Favonia
Desc: This sword was ever at the hip of the warrior from another land, and it bore witness to her achievement in spreading justice and freedom across Mondstadt.

Talent.Name: Aquila Favonia
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the opposing character uses a Skill:</color> If the character with this attached is the active character, heal this character for 1 HP. (Max twice per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3205}Sword Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
